pma:database.name: semantic_cluster
pma:database.pma:table: CREATE TABLE `item` ( `item_uid` varchar(16) NOT NULL DEFAULT '', `issue_id` enum('2gw194204','adv191102','ams192604','ams192605','ams192606','ams192607','bm192008','bm192009','bm192011','bm192112','bm192204','bm192208','bt193501','dsm19160305','dsm19161005','ic19230112','ls191905','ls191907','lsm19340310','lsm19341020','lsm19350330','nlt1940win','rr19330901','rr19430301','rr19440211','scs191905','scs19220801','smart191912','wt19360809','wt193610','wt193707','wt193802','wt193803','wt193807','wt193811') NOT NULL, `title_id` enum('2gw','adv','ams','bm','bed','dsm','ico','liv','lsm','nlt','ran','sau','sma','wei') NOT NULL, `start_pp` tinyint(3) NOT NULL, `end_pp` tinyint(3) NOT NULL, `item_url` varchar(27) NOT NULL, `item_title_m` varchar(46) NOT NULL, `genre_l` enum('article','column','feature','illustration','letters','misc','novel','photoprint','play','poem','review','serial','short','story','story reprint') NOT NULL, `item_pers_name` varchar(36) NOT NULL, `item_pers_role` enum('author','editor','illustrator','photographer') NOT NULL, PRIMARY KEY (`item_uid`), KEY `issue_id` (`issue_id`), KEY `title_id` (`title_id`), KEY `item_pers_name` (`item_pers_name`), FULLTEXT KEY `item_title_m` (`item_title_m`), CONSTRAINT `item2title` FOREIGN KEY (`title_id`) REFERENCES `title` (`title_uid`) ) ENGINE=InnoDB DEFAULT CHARSET=utf8mb4;
